bilingual.target: 人们一直在合作记录它的迁徙，并确保有足够的植物供它食用。

list.abstract: record（英[ˈrekɔːd , rɪˈkɔːd]，美[ˈrekərd , rɪˈkɔːrd]），英语单词，作名词为记录；成绩；履历，作动词为记录；记下…备案；录制。短语搭配有keep a record（保持记录）。例句为“Keep a record of their performance.（记录他们的表现。）” 该单词复数为records，第三人称单数为records，现在分词为recording，过去式为recorded，过去分词为recorded。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, Mr. Agos has a clean record.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官阁下，艾格斯先生没有犯罪记录。

yingyinNormal.en: So you want to set the record straight. Indeed, Dave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你想建立一个记录。是的，戴夫。

yingyinNormal.en: It's just to make a record, to satisfy the complaining gentleman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做个记录而已，给举报人一个交代。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we have no record of an Odyssey... I can't tell you anything until I get the flight recorder from my ship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们没有奥德赛号的记录... 在拿回飞船的飞行记录器前我什么都不会说。

yingyinNormal.en: Done. With time a-to-spare. Oooh, that may be a New World's record.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，时间还剩下很多。这可能是新世界记录。

yingyinNormal.en: Farkle, I don't think our permanent record begins in high school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法尔科，我觉得我们的永久档案并不是只从高中开始记录。

yingyinNormal.en: Did they cross at the hospital? Uh, there was no record of Dani visiting the hospital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们是否在医院遇到过？没有记录显示达妮去过医院。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm... I was a journalist, no criminal record. How am I suddenly such a threat, unless I'm…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我原本是个记者，没有犯罪记录，怎么突然就成了威胁？除非我……

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, but up to this point, your record doesn't warrant any placement at all. Good day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，但直到现在，你的记录还不能够保证能有任何职位。日安。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I believe you've just set the record for the shortest job interview in British military history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我觉得你刚刚创下了英国军事历史上最短的面试记录。

yingyinNormal.en: Let the record reflect that Mr. Fishbein has just exhibited a numbered tattoo from Auschwitz.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请记录费斯本先生展示了他胳膊上的奥斯威辛集中营留下的数字刺青。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig, you lost the world record. Everyone wants you to be champion again. It's important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸，你的世界记录被打破了。大家都希望你能重新成为冠军。这件事很重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are watching sport on television. It's a long jump. It's a new world record.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和他的家人在看电视里的体育节目。跳的可真远啊。这是一个新的世界记录。

yingyinNormal.en: He saw my juvie record and knew I had the perfect background for the next time someone tried to infiltrate the academy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他看到了我的青少年犯罪记录，知道我有绝佳背景可以替他们潜伏进警校。

yingyinNormal.en: How many times are you gonna do this? My record is 14. Okay, this is about science. Why'd you come to me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还要这样纠结多少遍？我的记录是14遍。这是跟科学有关的事。你为什么来问我？

yingyinNormal.en: So you didn't just record objective facts you memorialized subjective opinion, follow-ups, strategies. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你记录的不仅包括客观事实，还包括你主观的看法，后续调查，策略等等。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know that Leonard has a perfect driving record and enjoys the insurance discounts that go along with that? Hubba-hubba.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道莱纳德的驾驶记录超完美，因此能享受到车险打折这件事吗？很棒吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you show us where on your arms? Objection. Good, let's get the judge. I'm preserving my objection for the record.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以展示下胳膊上扎针的部位吗? 反对。好吧，让我们连线法官。请把我的反对意见记录在案。

yingyinNormal.en: But looking at the fossil record, knowing what I know about this infection, you cannot say for certain it isn't what killed off the dinosaurs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是看看化石记录，加上我对感染的了解，你不能完全否认当初灭绝恐龙的就是这东西。

yingyinNormal.en: This Russian cosmonaut holds the record for the most amount of time spent orbiting our planet, a total of 803 days, 9 hours, and 39 minutes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这位俄罗斯宇航员创了记录。他是环绕地球时间最久的人，总共803天9小时39分钟。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 成绩; 履历; 记录

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 录音机；录像机；数据刻录装置；记录员；记录人；被任命为兼职法官的大律师；竖笛；法官
v. 记录；录制；（record的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: n. 记录；记载；成绩；履历；纪录；最佳成绩；唱片；审判记录；唱片乐曲

sense_info_list.en: keep information for the future, by writing it down or storing it on a computer

examination_example.sentence: A smartphone may contain an arrestee's reading history, financial history, medical history and comprehensive <highlight>records</highlight> of recent correspondence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 智能手机可能包含被捕者的阅读史、财务史、病史和近期通信的综合记录。

examination_example.sentence: The fossil <highlight>record</highlight> shows that many species have endured for millions of years — so why shouldn't we?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 化石记录显示，许多物种已经存活了数百万年——那么我们为什么不能呢？

examination_example.sentence: And history should be the story of the masses and their <highlight>record</highlight> of struggle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而历史应该是群众的故事和他们奋斗的记录。

sense_info_list.en: the sum of the past achievements or actions of a person or organization; a person or thing's previous conduct or performance
sense_info_list.zh: 成绩; 履历; 记录

examination_example.sentence: College loan balances in the U.S. now stand at a <highlight>record</highlight> $1.5 trillion, according to the Federal Reserve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据美联储的数据，美国的大学贷款余额目前达到了创纪录的1.5万亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: Consumed a <highlight>record</highlight>-high percentage of budget.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消耗了创纪录的预算百分比。

examination_example.sentence: By most recent measures, the UK's GDP has been the envy of the Western world, with <highlight>record</highlight> low unemployment and high growth figures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 按照最新的衡量标准，英国GDP在欧洲一枝独秀，失业率创下历史新低，而GDP增长率高。

sense_info_list.en: change sound or visual images in a form (as on an optical disk or hard drive) that can be listened to or watched at a later time

examination_example.sentence: One format was replaced by another in the manner of <highlight>record</highlight> players being replaced by CD players.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一种格式取代另一种格式，这种格式取代就像激光唱机取代录音机一样。

sense_info_list.en: the best performance or most remarkable event of its kind that has been officially measured and noted

examination_example.sentence: Runners' times range from Andrew Baddeley's world <highlight>record</highlight> 13 minutes 48 seconds up to an hour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跑步者的用时区间从Andrew Baddeley创造的世界纪录13分48秒到一个小时不等。

sense_info_list.en: the facts that are known about a person or a company and the actions they have done in the past
to show a particular measurement or amount

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: keep information for the future, by writing it down or storing it on a computer

examination_example.sentence: A large proportion of the species is in continuous contact with technology that can <highlight>record</highlight> key features of an individual's behavior and environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很大一部分物种与可以记录个人行为和环境关键特征的技术持续接触。

examination_example.sentence: It follows a specific individual, such as a doctor or nurse, who can use it to <highlight>record</highlight> and access patient data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它跟随一个特定的人，比如医生或护士，他们可以用它来记录和访问病人的数据。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers have already begun to use smart phones in social scientific research to <highlight>record</highlight> activity using the device's built-in sensors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员已经开始在社会科学研究中使用智能手机，通过设备的内置传感器来记录活动。

examination_example.sentence: Toyohashi University of Technology has developed Terapio, a robotic medical cart that can make hospital rounds, deliver medications and other items, and retrieve <highlight>records</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 丰桥技术科学大学(Toyohashi University of Technology)开发了一种机器人医疗车“Terapio”，它可以在医院巡视，运送药品和其他物品，并检索记录。

examination_example.sentence: While Thanksgiving, Black Friday and Cyber Monday all saw <highlight>record</highlight> spending online, in-store sales plunged over the holiday weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在感恩节，黑色星期五和网络星期一期间，网上消费均创历史新高，而假日的店内销售则大幅下降。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: keep information for the future; by writing it down or storing it on a computer

examination_example.sentence: Should you tell your friends, for instance, that they're being <highlight>recorded</highlight> while you all watch the big game together?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你是否应该告诉你的朋友们，当你们一起观看大型比赛时，他们正在被记录下来？

examination_example.sentence: Those shifts have yet to be reflected in <highlight>record</highlight> obesity levels, which stand at 36.5% overall in the US.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些转变尚未反映在创纪录的肥胖水平中，美国的肥胖率大体上为36.5%。

examination_example.sentence: From now on, he would start <highlight>recording</highlight> his whole life in detail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从现在开始，他会开始详细记录自己的一生。

sense_info_list.en: change sound or visual images in a form (as on an optical disk or hard drive) that can be listened to or watched at a later time

examination_example.sentence: Before we continue, I just want to make you aware that this call is being <highlight>recorded</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们继续之前，我想让你知道这通电话正在被录音。

examination_example.sentence: She does <highlight>recording</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她录唱片。

examination_example.sentence: Veiseh can even put a date on when those tapes started <highlight>recording</highlight>: 15 December 2000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 韦赛赫甚至能记下这些磁带开始录制的日期：2000年12月15日。

sense_info_list.en: the best or fastest ever done
sense_info_list.zh: 最高成绩; 空前的; 创纪录的

examination_example.sentence: Income inequality rises to <highlight>record</highlight> levels in the United States, even in the midst of a <highlight>record</highlight> economic expansion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在创纪录的经济扩张期间，美国的收入不平等甚至上升到了创纪录的水平。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: After you've tried a new method for a week, take a look at your <highlight>record</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你尝试一种新方法一周后，看看你的记录。

examination_example.sentence: That season, I broke all of Miller's <highlight>records</highlight> while he watched the home games from the bench.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个赛季，当米勒坐在板凳上看主场比赛时，我打破了他的所有记录。

examination_example.sentence: Whoever finds their book will go to the site and <highlight>record</highlight> where they found it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论谁找到了他们的书，都会去网站记录下他们是在哪里找到的。

examination_example.sentence: How something as abstract as a Charlie Parker <highlight>record</highlight> gets us into a dialogue about our emotions and our thoughts?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像查理·帕克的唱片这样抽象的东西是如何让我们进入关于我们的情感和思想的对话的？

examination_example.sentence: If so, come early to the talk at 7:30 pm by Jules Skye, a successful <highlight>record</highlight> producer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果是这样，那就早点来参加晚上7:30由成功的唱片制作人朱尔斯·斯凯主持的讲座吧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 录音机；录像机；数据刻录装置；记录员；记录人；被任命为兼职法官的大律师；竖笛；法官
v. 记录；录制；（record的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: n. 记录；记载；成绩；履历；纪录；最佳成绩；唱片；审判记录；唱片乐曲

sense_info_list.en: keep information for the future, by writing it down or storing it on a computer

examination_example.sentence: At the same time, scientists scanned their brains and <highlight>recorded</highlight> their brain activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，科学家扫描他们的大脑，记录他们的大脑活动。

examination_example.sentence: His teachings were <highlight>recorded</highlight> by his followers in a book called Lunyu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的教诲被他的追随者记录在一本叫做《论语》的书中。

examination_example.sentence: The use of paper spread abroad, helping other cultures <highlight>record</highlight> and spread their ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纸的使用传播到国外，帮助其他文化记录和传播它们的思想。

sense_info_list.en: change sound or visual images in a form (as on an optical disk or hard drive) that can be listened to or watched at a later time

examination_example.sentence: You could use a smartphone to <highlight>record</highlight> some of the conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以用智能手机录下一些对话。

examination_example.sentence: Another kind allows users to listen to audiobooks (有声书) and even <highlight>record</highlight> their own voices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种（电话亭）允许用户收听有声书甚至录下自己的声音。

examination_example.sentence: He plays a new <highlight>record</highlight> of the pop songs and modem music for his listeners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他为他的听众播放了一张流行歌曲和现代音乐的新唱片。

sense_info_list.en: the best or fastest ever done
sense_info_list.zh: 最高成绩; 空前的; 创纪录的

examination_example.sentence: A world <highlight>record</highlight> says someone ate 73 hot dogs in 10 minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项世界纪录称，有人在10分钟内吃了73个热狗。

examination_example.sentence: Wu Dajing broke men's 500m short track speed skating world <highlight>record</highlight> in the quarterfinals of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympic Games.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在平昌冬奥会四分之一决赛中，武大靖打破了男子500米短道速滑世界纪录。

examination_example.sentence: Another Myotis bat holds the <highlight>record</highlight> for oldest age, reaching 41 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种鼠耳蝠保持着最长寿命的纪录，达到41岁。
